Title: The Rescuers
Director: John Lounsbery, Wolfgang Reitherman, Art Stevens
Writer: Margery Sharp (suggested by "The Rescuers" and "Miss Bianca" by), Larry Clemmons (story), Ken Anderson (story), Frank Thomas (story), Vance Gerry (story), David Michener (story), Ted Berman (story), Fred Lucky (story), Burny Mattinson (story), Dick Sebast (story)
Actors: Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor, Geraldine Page, Joe Flynn
Plot: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.
